content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

function pig_latinify(tokens, nthreads)
    q = Channel(Inf) do c
        for token in tokens
            put!(c, token)
        end
    end

    function pig_latinify_thread(q, aq)
        while true
            t = take!(q)
            a = pig_latinify(t)
            put!(aq, a)
        end
    end

    aq = Channel(nthreads)
    for _ in 1:nthreads
        Threads.@spawn pig_latinify_thread(q, aq)
    end

    a = Array(Vector{eltype(tokens)}, length(tokens))
    for j in 1:length(tokens)
        a[j] = take!(aq)
    end
end
